meanings.definition: In a manner befitting a president.
meanings.sent1: She spoke presidentially during the press conference.
meanings.sent2: The leader addressed the nation presidentially.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked presidentially across the room, as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree stood presidentially in the middle of the field, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The teacher gestured presidentially, trying to maintain order in the classroom.

meanings.definition: With the authority or dignity of a president.
meanings.sent1: He carried himself presidentially at the diplomatic meeting.
meanings.sent2: The CEO acted presidentially when making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled presidentially, pretending to be in charge of the iceberg.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse stood presidentially on the cliff, guiding ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The judge's gavel fell presidentially, signaling the end of the trial.
